title: LeaverBuster
body: I'm pretty sure leaverbuster is supposed to go away after one game, but i'm getting continuous games where i'm still being penalize. Now the reason i'm getting the leaverbuster is mostly due to the client crashing and not being notified(bathroom, eating, homework, etc..), because I'd expected to be logged in and hear the in-game music, so the game ends(by forfeit) without me knowing, because my game loads at about 2 minutes and i don't realise it till 5 minutes and by then, my team has surrendered. I don't know if this is a bug, but it occured twice and i don't want to wait 10 mins(5 minutes for one leave, 10 minutes for 2 games) for a game. I'd probably not play anymore if this occurs because it happened during my promotional ranked games and not on any other ranked or unranked games. The other reason is unrelated to a bug, so I won't comment.

replies.body:
Typically when you do get hit with a leaverbuster penalty, your account will be in low priority queue for 5 games. After that you won't have to go through the long queues anymore unless you get hit with another penalty. You can always check out our [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h2q1) for more info!

If you're still having issues with your client crashing I can try to help troubleshoot with a little more information. In the meantime, check out this [**Bug Splat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) for some steps you can take to help prevent those crashes in the future.

I also have a question. Whenever i get leaver buster i still get low priority queue of 20 minuets. Is there a way to lower this time?

It's been this way for a year or two since i never had stable internet when i got it.
